service.terms.1: 1. This quote is valid for 30 days.
service.terms.2: 2. Service begins upon contract signing and payment confirmation, valid for one year.
service.terms.3: 3. User seats and storage space may be expanded based on actual business requirements, with additional charges calculated according to current service pricing and remaining service period.
service.terms.4: 4. AI points, download data, and overseas acceleration data may be flexibly expanded based on actual business needs, with add-ons purchased according to minimum purchase specifications.

expansion.GA.desc: CDN/OSS acceleration package: 10TB per package (valid until consumed)
